articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: Palestinian medics said on Monday that at least 10 people were killed and 30 injured by Israeli tank shells that hit a food distribution centre in northern Gaza's Jabalia, with casualties including women and children.
articles.title: Israel steps up military pressure in north Gaza amid fears of siege and displacement

articles.author: Maayan Lubell, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Michelle Nichols
articles.description: The United Nations said Israeli tanks had burst into its base in southern Lebanon on Sunday, the latest accusation of Israeli violations against peacekeeping forces, as Hezbollah unleashed a deadly "swarm of drones" on an Israeli military camp.
articles.title: UN says Israeli tanks burst into peacekeeper base, while Hezbollah drones kill four

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: Israeli forces widened their raid into northern Gaza, and tanks reached the north edge of Gaza City, pounding some districts of the Sheikh Radwan neighborhood, residents said, forcing many families to leave their homes.
articles.title: Israeli tanks deepen their push into the northern Gaza Strip

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: China's military started a new round of war games near Taiwan on Monday, saying it was a warning to the "separatist acts of Taiwan independence forces", and offered no date for when they may conclude.
articles.title: China starts new round of war games near Taiwan, offers no end date

articles.author: Hyunsu Yim, Jack Kim
articles.description: North Korea is getting ready to blow up roads that cross the heavily militarised border with South Korea, Seoul said on Monday, amid an escalating war of words after the North accused its rival of sending drones over its capital Pyongyang.
articles.title: North Korea set to blow up cross-border roads with South amid drone row, Seoul says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The man, arrested on Saturday, was charged with possession of a loaded firearm and possession of a high-capacity magazine.
articles.title: Man arrested near Trump rally in California on gun charges

articles.author: Gerry Doyle
articles.description: Washington may need ‘deterrence by punishment’ to counter China’s missiles, says one analyst.
articles.title: Lessons from Iran missile attacks for defending against China's advanced arsenal

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: A Dutch woman who joined Islamic State in 2015 went on trial in the Netherlands on Monday for crimes against humanity for allegedly enslaving two Yazidi women in Syria.
articles.title: Dutch woman accused of enslaving Yazidi women while part of Islamic State goes on trial

articles.author: Stefanno Sulaiman, Ananda Teresia
articles.description: Indonesia's incoming president Prabowo Subianto is considering offering current finance minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati a cabinet minister post in his administration, two sources with knowledge of the situation told Reuters.
articles.title: Indonesia's Prabowo considering offering Sri Mulyani a cabinet post - sources

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The European Union agreed on Monday to impose sanctions on seven people and seven organisations linked to Iranian transfers of ballistic missiles to Russia.
articles.title: EU imposes sanctions over Iranian ballistic missile transfer to Russia
